curam.util.administration.intf
Interface LogAdmin

All Known Implementing Classes:
curam.util.administration.base.LogAdmin
Direct Known Subclasses:
LogAdminFactory
public abstract class LogAdmin
extends curam.util.administration.base.LogAdmin

LogAdmin is the administration interface for the Curam Authorization and Authentication Logs. These Logs provide information on successful and unsuccessful authentication attempts and unsuccessful authorization attempts. It provides methods for obtaining the log entries between a set of timestamps as well as a count of those entries.

numberOfAuthorisationEntries

public long numberOfAuthorisationEntries(LogKey timeRange)
                                  throws AppException,
                                         InformationalException,
                                         DatabaseException
Determine the number of entries in an authorization log for a given time period.

Parameters:
timeRange - Specifies the time range in which the entries should be counted. This range runs from the start time to the end time inclusive.
Returns:
A count of the number of entries in the specified time range.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
